product_name: The North Face Stow-N-Go II A/B High Impact Sports Bra
long_description: The North Face Stow-N-Go II A/B High Impact sports bra provides the support you need for trail runs, gym classes and other active pursuits. Quick-drying VaporWick(R) fabric seriously keeps up with hard-working pores, taking moisture from your skin and moving to the outside surface for quick evaporation. Double-layered panels of fabric offer additional modesty, and mesh panels placed over high heat areas enhance ventilation. Construction on interior of bra maximizes support and comfort. Internal pocket placed over sternum offers quick access to energy gels, keys or a debit card; moisture barrier in pocket protects contents. The North Face Stow-N-Go II A/B High Impact sports bra increases visibility in dim light thanks to its reflective logos.
short_description: The North Face Stow-N-Go II A/B High Impact sports bra provides the support you need for trail runs, gym classes and other active pursuits.
